attributes.action: Government own EV chargers to be installed to incentivise the purchasing of EVs.
attributes.additional_details:
This shall help people pay to charge their EV's and convince people  
To get an EV as it becomes more affordable and available to charge 
In public.
attributes.background: The Government should invest in installing their own EV charging points around the country at a minimum charging cost, to help with the lack of charging points chaos and to get ready for 2030.

rejection.details:
The Government is already investing in the rollout of electric vehicle charging infrastructure. You can find out more about this here: https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/government-grants-for-low-emission-vehicles

If you'd like the Government to take action on the cost of charging, we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Limit the price of residential electric vehicle chargers to energy price cap: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628189
